Instrument.description: Treble Flute pitched a fifth above concert flute
E♭ Flute minor third above concert flute
same as 6 hole Flageolet but metal construction
same as 6 hole Flageolet but metal construction
same as 6 hole Flageolet but metal construction
B♭ Clarinet (same as clarinet, added for MusicXML 3 compatibility)
12 Hole Chromatic Harmonica in Tenor C
10 Hole Diatonic Harmonica in High G
10 Hole Diatonic Harmonica in Low D
Tenor Trumpet (included for MusicXML 3 compatibility no range information available)
Electronic Rotary Organ (usually means Hammond with Leslie Speaker)
Balalaika in fact the prima but a generic for simplicity
Piccolo Balalaika (the smallest and rarest of the family)
Prima Balalaika (the most commonly played of the family)
Alto Viol (a smaller version of the tenor viol tuned higher)
